overview: In the film a teacher witnesses the murder of his favourite student who was killed by someone who is not only a student of the teacher but also the boyfriend of his own daughter. Through this killing, we will see the student politics scenario of West Bengal taking a roller coaster ride. The film’s backdrop is quite similar to Tapan Sinha’s 1986 film Atanka.
title: Mastermoshai Apni Kichu Dekhenni
